performances.venue: Radio City Music Hall New York, NY
performances.description: Surprised no one mentioned this one...nice kicking groove with Garcia's vocals in fine form...
The center of a Ollin Arrageed > Fire > Iko triptych. Included as a bonus track on the "Shakedown" CD. Just exactly perfect.
Extremely rare stand-alone "Fire"...2nd song, first set, and a real barn-burner!

performances.venue: Grand Prix Racecourse Watkins Glen, NY
performances.description: Embryonic "Fire" in the "soundcheck jam" into Wharf Rat. Not a full FTM, but of amazing Deadfulness and not listed elsewhere.  Check it out!
Fast, punchy version out of Cold Rain & Snow to start Set 2. Intercepted video feed shows everybody getting off. Howling solos.
I am pretty excited i get to post this.  Cool pre-drums aside from the Wave.  Smokin' Picasso>Fire!
Help->Slip->FIRE Nuff said
Excellent stand alone Fire on the Mountain it rolls so nicely out of Ollin, Very heady reminiscent of Egypt. Very cosmic and Heady
Closing of Winterland is classic Dead
This "Happiness is Drumming," (Hart) is proto-Fire, i.e., FOTM (Hart-Hunter) without lyrics.

performances.venue: Oakland-Alameda County Coliseum Stadium Oakland, CA
performances.description: Well jammed stand alone fire features great work from Jerry and Phil plus special guest Clarence Clemons. Out of Bucket takes everyone by surprise.

performances.venue: Greek Theatre - University of California Berkeley, CA
performances.description: Killer Fire to open 2nd set, I will take that anytime!!!!!!!!!

performances.venue: Uni Dome, U of Northern Iowa Cedar Falls, IA
performances.description: Crazy unique FOTM intro jam, unlike any other version I've heard. LOVE '78!
everyones playing in the heart of gold band!
Not many stand alone versions.  Jerry sound like he's going to croak, but still cool!
Last stand alone version in a year of some great FOTM.

performances.venue: Horton Field House - Illinois State University Normal, IL
performances.description: Jerry's Mutron magic and Bobby's noodling slide make this version unique. So much energy here.
Interesting stand alone fire comes out of a set 2 opening Bucket, really takes off when Bobby and Jerry start intertwining in the extended jam.
This is listed on the Scarlet Fire versions, but I think the FOTM is the highlight of the two.  Love Jerry's midi effects.

performances.venue: Montego Bay Freeport Zone Montego Bay, JM
performances.description: The story that Jerry kicks off Fire at dawn in MoBay alone is enough for the listen.

performances.venue: Greek Theatre, U. Of California Berkeley, CA
performances.description: prt of famouss Scarlet touch fire sequence
part of famous scarlet victim or the crime fire on the mountain sequence
Touch of Grey into a nice long Fire on the mountain real nice drawn out spacey ending into Dont Need Love. This is a meaty Scarlet->Touch->Fire
nice version from Brent rehearsal
Mt. St. Helens erupting mid-fire. Simply epic with a great show to back it all up. Portland, OR
into Stir It Up Jam

performances.venue: Madison Square Garden New York City, NY
performances.description: how is this not listed?! Jerry's vocals and solo are both strong. The crowd is fire. Keith,Donna,Bobby,Phil,Billy are all on fire too! Great recording
Fire theme jammed on considerably in Jam #1...a must-listen

performances.venue: Barton Hall - Cornell University Ithaca, NY
performances.description: Flawless
Jerry at his best
Why is this not on the list of best? Jerry killed it in Hampton in 1988
Hot right from the start
Not on Archive but one hell of a barnburner. Check Youtube: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EmN0mFHDH2w
Excellent studio outtake with out all the added production the released version has.
Amazing Fire!  Listen to the jam that Jerry drops into at around 5:40 ,  really the whole entire first solo brings a tear to my eye!

performances.venue: Long Beach Arena Long Beach, CA
performances.description: Absolutely Blistering Fire!
A true GEM in the 77/78 era
Powerful ending!
Brilliant, lyrical solos from Jerry, every phrase crackles with poetry and meaning. Highly recommended.
